title: Sealedenvelope.com
text: Sealedenvelope.com is British collaboration that provides support services for <a href="clinical%20trials">clinical trials</a>. They provide services such as <a href="randomization">randomization</a>, <a href="allocation%20concealment">allocation concealment</a>, <a href="code-break%20procedure">code-break services</a>, and case report management through a web-based design. They also perform certain calculations such as <a href="power%20%28statistics%29">power</a> calculations.
